headline: Google Now Factoring HTTPS Support Into Ranking; CloudFlare On Track to Make it Free and Easy
keywords: SEO, Google, HTTPS, SSL, Optimization, Security
description: As of today, there are only about 2 million websites that support HTTPS. That's a shamefully low number. Two things are about to happen that we at CloudFlare are hopeful will begin to change that and make everyone love locks (at least on the web!).
